summary.p: In this second volume, Franklin Edgerton has edited four different recentions of the Vikramacarita; the first volume contains the translation. The parallels to the Vahnipurāṇa śiber upākhyāna are found in the southern recension of stories 11 and 13.
This copy, from the Princeton Theological Seminary, was digitized by the Internet Archive in 2022.

body.p:
rājānam abravīt: bho mahāpuruṣa, parārthaṃ śarīraṃ prayacchatas
tavaiva jīvitaṃ ślāghyam. kutaḥ:

lg.l: tasyaiva jīvitaṃ ślāghyaṃ yaḥ parārthaṃ hi jīvati 8

body.p: bhavādṛśāṃ parkopakāriṇām etac citraṃ na bhavati. uktaṃ ca:

lg.l: kim atra citraṃ yat santaḥ parānugrahatatparāḥ ?

body.p:
anyac ca: bho mahāsattva, anenaiva paropakāreṇa tvaṃ sarvāḥ
saṃpadaḥ prāpnoṣi. tathā coktam:

lg.l: sa saṃpadaṃ samāpnoti parād api ca yat param. 10
jagaddhitāya janitāḥ sādhavas tv īdṛśā bhuvi. 11

body.p:
evaṃ bhaṇitvā rājānaṃ punar abravīt: bho mahāsattva, tavā'haṃ
tuṣṭo 'smi, varaṃ vṛṣīṣva. rājñoktam: bho rākṣasa, tvam api mama
yadi prasanno jāto 'si, tarhy adyaprabhṛti manuṣyabhakṣaṇaṃ
parityaja. anyad api: mayo 'cyamānam upadeśaṃ śṛṇu. tathā:

lg.l: yathā'tmanaḥ priyāḥ prāṇāḥ, sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ tathā;
tasmān mṛtyubhayāt te 'pi trātavyāḥ prāṇino budhaiḥ. 12
kliśyanti jantavo ghore, mṛtyos trasyanti te yataḥ. 13

yathā ca te jīvitam ātmanaḥ priyaṃ,
tathā pareṣām api jīvitaṃ priyam;

saṃrakṣyate jīvitam ātmano yathā,
tathā pareṣām api rakṣa jīvitam. 15

body.p:
iti rājñā nirūpito rākṣasas tadāprabhṛti prāṇimāraṇaṃ tyaktvān;
rājā vikramo 'pi svanagaram agamat.

lg.l: yo duḥkhitāni bhūtāni dṛṣṭvā bhavati duḥkhitaḥ,
sukhitāni sukhī cāpi, sa dharmaṃ veda naiṣṭhikam. 3
nā'to bhūyāṅs tato dharmaḥ kaścid anyo 'sti dehinām,
param ekasya sattvasya pradātur jīvitaṃ varam,
tasya dehavimuktasya kṣaya eva na vidyate. 6
mahatām api yajñānāṃ kālena kṣīyate phalam;
dattvā'bhayaṃ pradānasya kṣaya eva na vidyate. 8
dattam iṣṭaṃ tapas taptaṃ tīrthayātrā śrutaṃ tathā,
yaś cā'bhayaṃ ca bhūtebhyas, tayor abhayado 'dhikaḥ. 10
dhruvaṃ yo nā'rjayed dharmaṃ, sa śocyo mūḍhacetanaḥ. 11
tataḥ kim upakāro 'sya pratyahaṃ kriyate nṛbhiḥ? 12
sa saṃpadaṃ samāpnoti parād api ca yat param. 14
